title: Yammer: Support for Microsoft Defender for Cloud Apps (formerly Microsoft Cloud App Security)
description:
Yammer supports Microsoft Defender for Cloud Apps (formerly Microsoft Cloud App Security). Users are properly routed to their intended target destination after authentication via Microsoft Defender for Cloud Apps.
More info: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/defender-cloud-apps/what-is-defender-for-cloud-apps
GA date: May CY2022
